page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO USK
page.content:
USK is the main town in our 'D' block. The main features in this rural area are the{River Usk},the ruins of the{Norman castle},the{New School}and the{Detention Centre.}The best place from which to {view}the area is to stand on top of the hill where the ruins of the castle are, then you will be able to see the whole of Usk and the surrounding countryside.
The land outside{Usk}is mainly farming country, grass for{cattle}and{sheep. Some{crops}are grown, mainly as cattle feed. Barley, winter wheat and potatoes are the most common.
The other main feature is the{dual {carriage way}from{Newport}to{Ross {linking the{M4}and{M50.
